content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":263092,"originalJapaneseLine":"奥のケイブリスの部屋も揺れた","translatedEnglishLine":"The room of Caveblis in the back also shook."},{"lineNumber":263093,"originalJapaneseLine":"衝撃であわてる・・なにごとだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Startled by the shock... What is happening?"},{"lineNumber":263094,"originalJapaneseLine":"ストロガノフが気絶している、最弱だからな","translatedEnglishLine":"Stroganoff has fainted; he's the weakest after all."},{"lineNumber":263095,"originalJapaneseLine":"ワンニャンは別に気にしない、地震じゃない？","translatedEnglishLine":"Wanyan doesn't particularly mind. Isn't it an earthquake?"},{"lineNumber":263096,"originalJapaneseLine":"みてくるわん","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll go check it out, woof."},{"lineNumber":263097,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、マエリータ隊、ベズドグ山内","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, Maerita's squad, inside Mount Bezdog."},{"lineNumber":263098,"originalJapaneseLine":"洞窟の一部が崩れ、メンバーが負傷し、死んでいる者もいた","translatedEnglishLine":"Part of the cave collapsed; some members were injured, and some had died."},{"lineNumber":263099,"originalJapaneseLine":"状況を把握する為に連絡偵察を出させ、残りの者で負傷兵の手当と救出","translatedEnglishLine":"They sent out scouts to assess the situation, while the rest tended to and rescued the wounded."},{"lineNumber":263100,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな状況","translatedEnglishLine":"Such was the situation."},{"lineNumber":263101,"originalJapaneseLine":"連絡に出していた者が戻って北","translatedEnglishLine":"The scouts that were sent for communication returned, heading north."},{"lineNumber":263102,"originalJapaneseLine":"人間共の浮遊城がつっこんできた","translatedEnglishLine":"The humans' floating castle charged in."},{"lineNumber":263103,"originalJapaneseLine":"むむ、奴らここがケイブリス様の居城として知っていたのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, they knew this was Lord Caveblis's stronghold."},{"lineNumber":263104,"originalJapaneseLine":"これはいかん、とにかくケイブリス様に知らせろ","translatedEnglishLine":"This is bad. Anyway, inform Lord Caveblis."},{"lineNumber":263105,"originalJapaneseLine":"いやな予感がする","translatedEnglishLine":"I have a bad feeling about this."},{"lineNumber":263106,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、ケイブリスの部屋の近く","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, near Caveblis's room."},{"lineNumber":263107,"originalJapaneseLine":"ワンニャンがめんどくさそうに歩いていると、あわてて魔物兵が来る","translatedEnglishLine":"As Wanyan walks lazily, a monster soldier rushes over in a panic."},{"lineNumber":263108,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスに報告にきた魔物だ、人間共の城が突っ込んできた。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a monster who came to report to Caveblis: the humans' castle has charged in."},{"lineNumber":263109,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスマスターが侵入してきた可能性がある、ケイブリス様気をつけて下さいと","translatedEnglishLine":"There is a possibility the Chaos Master has intruded. Please be careful, Lord Caveblis."},{"lineNumber":263110,"originalJapaneseLine":"なるほど、わかった。その事は私達がケイブリス様に伝える。","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, understood. We will inform Lord Caveblis about this."},{"lineNumber":263111,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前達は戻っていいぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"You all may return."},{"lineNumber":263112,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":263113,"originalJapaneseLine":"報告にいこー","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's go report—"},{"lineNumber":263114,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっと待って","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait a moment."},{"lineNumber":263115,"originalJapaneseLine":"人間共が侵入して来たというと言うとケイブリス様は不機嫌になって怒る","translatedEnglishLine":"If you say the humans have invaded, Lord Caveblis gets upset and angry."},{"lineNumber":263116,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも、人間共が侵入してきたでも撃退に成功しましたと言うと喜んで褒めてくれるよ","translatedEnglishLine":"But if you say the humans invaded but were repelled successfully, he'll be happy and praise you."},{"lineNumber":263117,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうせ撃退なんて確実に出来るのだから","translatedEnglishLine":"Since repelling them is definitely possible anyway."},{"lineNumber":263118,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうだね、そうしよう","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right, let's do that."},{"lineNumber":263119,"originalJapaneseLine":"報告してほめてもらうにゃん","translatedEnglishLine":"Report it and get praised, nyan."},{"lineNumber":263120,"originalJapaneseLine":"ベズドグ山内、マエリータ隊と遭遇　戦闘になります。","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside Mount Bezdog, they encounter Maerita's squad—battle Let's go."},{"lineNumber":263133,"originalJapaneseLine":"と勇者もベズドグ山に入る","translatedEnglishLine":"And the hero also enters Mount others..."},{"lineNumber":263136,"originalJapaneseLine":"＜最終決戦　２６０／１／テオマンの妨害４＞　","translatedEnglishLine":"<Final Battle 260/1/Teoman's Obstruction 4>"},{"lineNumber":263137,"originalJapaneseLine":"と若干状況は違うが同じノリです","translatedEnglishLine":"Though the situation is slightly different, the vibe is the same."},{"lineNumber":263138,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、ケイブリスの部屋の近く、ストロガノフの部屋","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, near Caveblis's room, Stroganoff's room."},{"lineNumber":263139,"originalJapaneseLine":"ストロガノフが起きる","translatedEnglishLine":"Stroganoff wakes Caveblis."},{"lineNumber":263142,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとなく嘘ではないかとかんぐるが、ワンニャンの方がえらいので逆らえない","translatedEnglishLine":"He suspects it's a lie somehow, but since Wanyan is superior, he can't oppose passage."},{"lineNumber":263144,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達を見て逃げて行く魔物兵、一体を捕まえる","translatedEnglishLine":"A monster soldier fleeing upon seeing Lance and the others is location."},{"lineNumber":263147,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile..."},{"lineNumber":263148,"originalJapaneseLine":"忠義心を持った魔物兵も中にはいる","translatedEnglishLine":"Among and the others' invasion but..."},{"lineNumber":263150,"originalJapaneseLine":"恐瘴気が強くなる、うっ・・いつもよりきつそうだ","translatedEnglishLine":"The foul miasma grows stronger. Ugh... It's harsher than usual."},{"lineNumber":263151,"originalJapaneseLine":"薬もないが・・いけるか・・いや、いかねば・・と","translatedEnglishLine":"Without medicine... can he make it? No, he must go..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奥のケイブリスの部屋も揺れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The room of Caveblis in the back also shook.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 衝撃であわてる・・なにごとだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Startled by the shock... What is happening?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフが気絶している、最弱だからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff has fainted; he's the weakest after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワンニャンは別に気にしない、地震じゃない？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wanyan doesn't particularly mind. Isn't it an earthquake?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みてくるわん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll go check it out, woof.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、マエリータ隊、ベズドグ山内
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Maerita's squad, inside Mount Bezdog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 洞窟の一部が崩れ、メンバーが負傷し、死んでいる者もいた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Part of the cave collapsed; some members were injured, and some had died.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 状況を把握する為に連絡偵察を出させ、残りの者で負傷兵の手当と救出
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They sent out scouts to assess the situation, while the rest tended to and rescued the wounded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Such was the situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連絡に出していた者が戻って北
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The scouts that were sent for communication returned, heading north.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間共の浮遊城がつっこんできた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The humans' floating castle charged in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むむ、奴らここがケイブリス様の居城として知っていたのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, they knew this was Lord Caveblis's stronghold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはいかん、とにかくケイブリス様に知らせろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is bad. Anyway, inform Lord Caveblis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いやな予感がする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have a bad feeling about this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ケイブリスの部屋の近く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, near Caveblis's room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワンニャンがめんどくさそうに歩いていると、あわてて魔物兵が来る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Wanyan walks lazily, a monster soldier rushes over in a panic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスに報告にきた魔物だ、人間共の城が突っ込んできた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a monster who came to report to Caveblis: the humans' castle has charged in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスマスターが侵入してきた可能性がある、ケイブリス様気をつけて下さいと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a possibility the Chaos Master has intruded. Please be careful, Lord Caveblis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるほど、わかった。その事は私達がケイブリス様に伝える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, understood. We will inform Lord Caveblis about this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前達は戻っていいぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all may return.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 報告にいこー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's go report—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと待って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間共が侵入して来たというと言うとケイブリス様は不機嫌になって怒る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you say the humans have invaded, Lord Caveblis gets upset and angry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、人間共が侵入してきたでも撃退に成功しましたと言うと喜んで褒めてくれるよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But if you say the humans invaded but were repelled successfully, he'll be happy and praise you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうせ撃退なんて確実に出来るのだから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since repelling them is definitely possible anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだね、そうしよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, let's do that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 報告してほめてもらうにゃん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Report it and get praised, nyan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山内、マエリータ隊と遭遇　戦闘になります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside Mount Bezdog, they encounter Maerita's squad—battle ensues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜最終決戦　２６０／２／マエリータ／戦闘前＞　とは若干状況は違いますが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though the situation differs somewhat from <Final Battle 260/2/Maerita/Before Battle>,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほぼ同じノリです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's pretty much the same vibe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山内、マエリータ隊と遭遇　戦闘になります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside Mount Bezdog, encountering Maerita's squad—battle will start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜最終決戦　２６０／２／マエリータ／戦闘後＞　とは若干状況は違いますが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though the situation is slightly different from <Final Battle 260/2/Maerita/After Battle>,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほぼ同じノリです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's almost the same tone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ベズドグ山の近く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, near Mount Bezdog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇者とコーラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hero and Kola.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・ランスめ、ここまでするのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Lance, is he really going this far...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたとは大違いですね、大胆で早い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's totally different from you; bold and quick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また、彼に先をこされてしまうかしら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Will he get ahead of me again, I wonder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今度はそうはさせない、いくぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, I won't let that happen. Let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と勇者もベズドグ山に入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And the hero also enters Mount Bezdog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山内、溶岩通路
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside Mount Bezdog, in the lava passage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の前にテオマンが現れる・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Teoman appears before Lance and the others...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜最終決戦　２６０／１／テオマンの妨害４＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Final Battle 260/1/Teoman's Obstruction 4>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と若干状況は違うが同じノリです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though the situation is slightly different, the vibe is the same.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ケイブリスの部屋の近く、ストロガノフの部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, near Caveblis's room, Stroganoff's room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフが起きる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff wakes up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっと目をさます、状況を聞く・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He finally wakes up and asks about the situation...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワンニャンがケイブリスにしたのと同じ嘘を付く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wanyan tells the same lie to him that was told to Caveblis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなく嘘ではないかとかんぐるが、ワンニャンの方がえらいので逆らえない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He suspects it's a lie somehow, but since Wanyan is superior, he can't oppose him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山内、魔物城内通路
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside Mount Bezdog, the monster castle passage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達を見て逃げて行く魔物兵、一体を捕まえる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A monster soldier fleeing upon seeing Lance and the others is captured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王美樹はどこにいると聞くと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When asked where Demon Lord Miki is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぺらぺらと居場所をしゃべる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He chatters away, revealing her location.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忠義心を持った魔物兵も中にはいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among them are also monster soldiers with a sense of loyalty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の侵入をストロガノフ様に伝えようと走っているが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One runs to inform Lord Stroganoff of Lance and the others' invasion but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐瘴気が強くなる、うっ・・いつもよりきつそうだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The foul miasma grows stronger. Ugh... It's harsher than usual.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 薬もないが・・いけるか・・いや、いかねば・・と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without medicine... can he make it? No, he must go...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奥のケイブリスの部屋も揺れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The room of Caveblis in the back also shook.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 衝撃であわてる・・なにごとだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Startled by the shock... What is happening?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフが気絶している、最弱だからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff has fainted; he's the weakest after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワンニャンは別に気にしない、地震じゃない？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wanyan doesn't particularly mind. Isn't it an earthquake?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みてくるわん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll go check it out, woof.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、マエリータ隊、ベズドグ山内
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Maerita's squad, inside Mount Bezdog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 洞窟の一部が崩れ、メンバーが負傷し、死んでいる者もいた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Part of the cave collapsed; some members were injured, and some had died.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 状況を把握する為に連絡偵察を出させ、残りの者で負傷兵の手当と救出
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They sent out scouts to assess the situation, while the rest tended to and rescued the wounded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Such was the situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連絡に出していた者が戻って北
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The scouts that were sent for communication returned, heading north.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間共の浮遊城がつっこんできた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The humans' floating castle charged in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むむ、奴らここがケイブリス様の居城として知っていたのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, they knew this was Lord Caveblis's stronghold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはいかん、とにかくケイブリス様に知らせろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is bad. Anyway, inform Lord Caveblis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いやな予感がする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have a bad feeling about this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ケイブリスの部屋の近く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, near Caveblis's room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワンニャンがめんどくさそうに歩いていると、あわてて魔物兵が来る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Wanyan walks lazily, a monster soldier rushes over in a panic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスに報告にきた魔物だ、人間共の城が突っ込んできた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a monster who came to report to Caveblis: the humans' castle has charged in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスマスターが侵入してきた可能性がある、ケイブリス様気をつけて下さいと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a possibility the Chaos Master has intruded. Please be careful, Lord Caveblis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるほど、わかった。その事は私達がケイブリス様に伝える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, understood. We will inform Lord Caveblis about this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前達は戻っていいぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all may return.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 報告にいこー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's go report—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと待って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間共が侵入して来たというと言うとケイブリス様は不機嫌になって怒る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you say the humans have invaded, Lord Caveblis gets upset and angry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、人間共が侵入してきたでも撃退に成功しましたと言うと喜んで褒めてくれるよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But if you say the humans invaded but were repelled successfully, he'll be happy and praise you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうせ撃退なんて確実に出来るのだから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since repelling them is definitely possible anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだね、そうしよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, let's do that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 報告してほめてもらうにゃん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Report it and get praised, nyan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山内、マエリータ隊と遭遇　戦闘になります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside Mount Bezdog, they encounter Maerita's squad—battle ensues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜最終決戦　２６０／２／マエリータ／戦闘前＞　とは若干状況は違いますが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though the situation differs somewhat from <Final Battle 260/2/Maerita/Before Battle>,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほぼ同じノリです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's pretty much the same vibe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山内、マエリータ隊と遭遇　戦闘になります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside Mount Bezdog, encountering Maerita's squad—battle will start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜最終決戦　２６０／２／マエリータ／戦闘後＞　とは若干状況は違いますが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though the situation is slightly different from <Final Battle 260/2/Maerita/After Battle>,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほぼ同じノリです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's almost the same tone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ベズドグ山の近く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, near Mount Bezdog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇者とコーラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hero and Kola.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・ランスめ、ここまでするのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Lance, is he really going this far...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたとは大違いですね、大胆で早い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's totally different from you; bold and quick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また、彼に先をこされてしまうかしら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Will he get ahead of me again, I wonder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今度はそうはさせない、いくぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, I won't let that happen. Let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と勇者もベズドグ山に入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And the hero also enters Mount Bezdog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山内、溶岩通路
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside Mount Bezdog, in the lava passage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の前にテオマンが現れる・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Teoman appears before Lance and the others...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜最終決戦　２６０／１／テオマンの妨害４＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Final Battle 260/1/Teoman's Obstruction 4>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と若干状況は違うが同じノリです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though the situation is slightly different, the vibe is the same.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ケイブリスの部屋の近く、ストロガノフの部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, near Caveblis's room, Stroganoff's room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフが起きる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff wakes up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっと目をさます、状況を聞く・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He finally wakes up and asks about the situation...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワンニャンがケイブリスにしたのと同じ嘘を付く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wanyan tells the same lie to him that was told to Caveblis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなく嘘ではないかとかんぐるが、ワンニャンの方がえらいので逆らえない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He suspects it's a lie somehow, but since Wanyan is superior, he can't oppose him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山内、魔物城内通路
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside Mount Bezdog, the monster castle passage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達を見て逃げて行く魔物兵、一体を捕まえる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A monster soldier fleeing upon seeing Lance and the others is captured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王美樹はどこにいると聞くと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When asked where Demon Lord Miki is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぺらぺらと居場所をしゃべる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He chatters away, revealing her location.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忠義心を持った魔物兵も中にはいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among them are also monster soldiers with a sense of loyalty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の侵入をストロガノフ様に伝えようと走っているが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One runs to inform Lord Stroganoff of Lance and the others' invasion but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐瘴気が強くなる、うっ・・いつもよりきつそうだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The foul miasma grows stronger. Ugh... It's harsher than usual.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 薬もないが・・いけるか・・いや、いかねば・・と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without medicine... can he make it? No, he must go...
